data.title: Rough Guides (TBS; RKP; Rough Guides; Penguin)
data.text:
ROUGH GUIDES (Routledge Kegan Paul)

Series Note: "Rough Guides are designed to be good to read and easy to use.

The colour section introduces [the country], suggesting where to go and what not to miss, followed by a full list of contents. Then comes Basics, for pre-departure information and other practicalities.

The Guide pages cover the country's regions in depth, each starting with a highlights panel and map to help you plan your route.

The Contexts section fills you in on history and wildlife, and reviews the best books and films on the country."

-- The Rough Guide to Australia. 6th edition. Margo Daly et al. New York, London & Delhi: Rough Guides, 2003.(A) ROUGH GUIDES TRAVEL
